sqlMap.select:
select productid, P.tradename, P.typeno, P.color, P.packaging, P.item10, P.unit from etb_untaxinfo S left join etb_product P on P.id = S.productid where 1 = 1
S.productid = #productid#
group by S.productid
select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename from etb_untaxinfo T where 1 = 1 and id = #id#

select * from ( select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename from etb_untaxinfo T where 1 = 1
T.status = #status#
T.productid = #productid#
T.warehousename = #warehousename#
) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.customername like '%$customername$%' ESCAPE '/'
order by A.updatedate desc, A.id desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from ( select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename from etb_untaxinfo T where 1 = 1
T.status = #status#
T.productid = #productid#
T.warehousename = #warehousename#
) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
A.customername like '%$customername$%' ESCAPE '/'
sqlMap.update: update etb_untaxinfo set warehousename = #warehousename#, belongto = #belongto#, productid = #productid#, quantity = #quantity#, customertype = #customertype#, customerid = #customerid#, customername = #customername#, note = #note#, rank = #rank#, status = #status#, res01 = #res01#, res02 = #res02#, res03 = #res03#, res04 = #res04#, res05 = #res05#, updateuid = #updateuid#, updatedate = NOW() where id = #id#
